excerpt: These flavorful vegan tacos are filled with protein-rich chickpeas, fresh vegetables, and zesty spices.

instructions.name: Chickpea Filling
instructions: In a pan, heat the olive oil over medium-high heat.
Add the onion and garlic, and cook for 2-3 minutes until softened.
Add the chickpeas, tomato, cumin, paprika, salt, and pepper. Cook for another 5 minutes, stirring occasionally.
Remove from heat and set aside.

instructions.name: Taco Assembly
instructions: Warm the tortillas in a pan or in the microwave.
To each tortilla, add a scoop of the chickpea filling, some shredded lettuce, sliced avocado, and chopped cilantro.
Squeeze a lime wedge over each taco, and serve immediately.
